question: Which Indian squash player has won the 2017 Men's Makati Open Squash tournament?
explanation: Indian squash player Harinder Pal Sandhu has won the 2017 Men\'s Makati Open Squash tournament by defeating Mohd. Syafiq Kamal of Malaysia in the final by 11-5, 11-7, 11-7 at the Manila Polo Club in Makati City, Phillipines. In the women’s final, Japan’s Satomi Watanabe bagged her first career title by beating Wales’ Deon Saffery.
